title: Колл-центр
overview: Twelve co-workers of the call center of the online shop "Boutique for Adults" are trapped on the 12th floor of the Gloria Plaza business center in Moscow. Suddenly the intruders named "mom" and "dad" tell them that the building is mined. For a bomb not to explode, the workers must comply with the criminals' demands. Will the hostages be able to defuse the bomb in 8 hours, escape and still remain humans?
